modelIdentification.name: LBML
modelIdentification.description: Low level BML orders/tasks and reports.

interactionClass.name: LBMLMessage
interactionClass.semantics: Root class of low level BML interactions

interactionClass.name: LBMLTask
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction for ordering a unit to execute a task.

parameter.name: Task
parameter.semantics: Identifies the task.

parameter.name: Taskee
parameter.semantics: The unit that has to execute the task.

parameter.name: Tasker
parameter.semantics: Identifies the commander of the task.

parameter.name: StartWhen
parameter.semantics: Time when the task execution has to start.

parameter.name: EndWhen
parameter.semantics: Time when the task execution has to end. 00000000000000.000 means no end time.

parameter.name: Why
parameter.semantics: For what reason has this task to be executed.

parameter.name: TaskType
parameter.semantics: Determines how this new task is related to the current task.

interactionClass.name: Move
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks a unit to move in the specified direction. The unit will keep on moving until the specified end time or when ordered otherwise.

parameter.name: Direction
parameter.semantics: Determines the azimuth direction, in radians.

interactionClass.name: MoveToLocation
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks a unit to move to the specified destination.

parameter.name: Destination
parameter.semantics: The location to move to.

parameter.name: MoveType
parameter.semantics: Indicates if roads have to be followed.

parameter.name: Waypoints
parameter.semantics: Optional route to the destination.

interactionClass.name: MoveToUnit
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks a unit to move to another unit.

parameter.name: Unit
parameter.semantics: The unit to move to.

parameter.name: MoveType
parameter.semantics: Indicates if roads have to be followed.

parameter.name: Waypoints
parameter.semantics: Optional route to the destination.

interactionClass.name: MoveIntoFormation
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks an aggregate unit to move into the given formation with the given heading.

parameter.name: Formation
parameter.semantics: The category of positional arrangement of the entities within the aggregate.

parameter.name: Distance
parameter.semantics: Distance between the individual vehicles in the formation.

parameter.name: Location
parameter.semantics: The location (x, y and z) to move to.

parameter.name: Heading
parameter.semantics: The heading of the formation in radians.

interactionClass.name: FollowRoute
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks a unit to follow the specified route.

parameter.name: ControlMeasure
parameter.semantics: Follow a control measure referenced by an entity identifier struct. This would typically be an envionmental object which contains one (waypoint) or many points (route), but could also be another entity.

interactionClass.name: FollowUnit
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks a unit to follow another unit.

parameter.name: Unit
parameter.semantics: The unit to follow.

parameter.name: Behind
parameter.semantics: The distance in meters behind the unit to follow.

parameter.name: Right
parameter.semantics: The distance in meters to the right of the unit to follow.

parameter.name: Above
parameter.semantics: The distance in meters above the unit to follow.

interactionClass.name: TurnToHeading
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks a unit to turn to the specified heading.

parameter.name: Heading
parameter.semantics: Determines the heading, in radians, a unit has to turn to.

interactionClass.name: VehicleMount
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks a unit to mount the specified vehicle.

parameter.name: VehicleToMount
parameter.semantics: The vehicle to mount.

interactionClass.name: VehicleDismount
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks a unit to dismount.

interactionClass.name: FireAtLocation
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks a unit to fire at a location.

parameter.name: TargetLocation
parameter.semantics: The location to fire at.

interactionClass.name: FireIndirectWM
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks a unit to fire at a location with the specified weapon and munition.

interactionClass.name: FireAtUnit
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks a unit to fire at another specified unit.

parameter.name: Target
parameter.semantics: The unit to fire at.

parameter.name: WeaponTypeToUse
parameter.semantics: The weapon type to use.

parameter.name: MunitionTypeToUse
parameter.semantics: The munition type that should be used by the select weapon type.

interactionClass.name: Wait
interactionClass.semantics: Tasks a unit to wait until the specified end time. Wait indefinitely if no end time is specified.

interactionClass.name: ChangeOrderedSpeed
interactionClass.semantics: Change the ordered speed. Usually sent with TaskType InterruptCurrentTask to adjust the current move task.

parameter.name: Speed
parameter.semantics: Determines the ordered speed to set for a unit, in m/s.

interactionClass.name: ChangeOrderedAltitude
interactionClass.semantics: Change the ordered altitude. Usually sent with TaskType InterruptCurrentTask to adjust the current move task.

interactionClass.name: SetRulesOfEngagement
interactionClass.semantics: Change the rules of engagment for a unit.

parameter.name: RulesOfEngagement
parameter.semantics: Determines the rules of engagment for a unit.

interactionClass.name: LBMLTaskManagement
interactionClass.semantics: Task management interactions. For now only used to cancel tasks. Can be extended to reschedule tasks, etc.

parameter.name: Taskee
parameter.semantics: The unit that has to execute the task.

parameter.name: Tasker
parameter.semantics: Identifies the commander of the task.

interactionClass.name: CancelAllTasks
interactionClass.semantics: Cancel all tasks. Tasks already started have to be aborted immediately.

interactionClass.name: CancelSpecifiedTasks
interactionClass.semantics: Cancel all specified tasks. Tasks already started have to be aborted immediately.

parameter.name: Tasks
parameter.semantics: Tasks that have to be cancelled.

interactionClass.name: LBMLReport
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction for sending reports from a simulation framework (e.g. VR-Forces) to a BML agent framework.

parameter.name: When
parameter.semantics: Date and time when the reported status was valid.

parameter.name: Comments
parameter.semantics: Any additional comments

interactionClass.name: StatusReport
interactionClass.semantics: Status report from a friendly unit about its own (perceived) state. The C2 agent shall base its low level BML tasks on this perceived truth data of blue units instead of RPR ground truth data, although for blue units perceived and ground truth data might be the same (but not necessarily).

parameter.name: Unit
parameter.semantics: The unit that is reported about.

interactionClass.name: TaskStatusReport
interactionClass.semantics: A report about the status of a task the unit was ordered to execute.

parameter.name: Task
parameter.semantics: Identifies the task associated with the task report.

parameter.name: TaskStatus
parameter.semantics: Indicates the evaluation status of the task.

interactionClass.name: PositionStatusReport
interactionClass.semantics: Report about the position, speed, and heading of the unit.

parameter.name: Position
parameter.semantics: Position of the unit at the specified time.

parameter.name: Heading
parameter.semantics: Heading of the unit.

parameter.name: Speed
parameter.semantics: Speed of the unit.

interactionClass.name: DamageStatusReport
interactionClass.semantics: Represents a report from an unit that has been damaged or destroyed.

parameter.name: DamageType
parameter.semantics: Damage state of the reported unit.

interactionClass.name: FuelStatusReport
interactionClass.semantics: Report about the amount of fuel the unit has left. FuelType is a string since it is still experimental.

parameter.name: FuelType
parameter.semantics: The type of fuel

parameter.name: FuelPercentage
parameter.semantics: The amount of fuel the unit has not yet used, in percentages.

interactionClass.name: AmmunitionStatusReport
interactionClass.semantics: Report about the amount of ammunition the unit has left.

parameter.name: AmmunitionType
parameter.semantics: The type of ammunition.

parameter.name: AmmunitionPercentage
parameter.semantics: The amount of ammunition the entity has not yet used in percentages.

interactionClass.name: UnderAttackStatusReport
interactionClass.semantics: Report that the unit is under attack.

parameter.name: FromDirection
parameter.semantics: Direction from which the unit is attacked.

parameter.name: Severeness
parameter.semantics: Severeness of the attack upon the reporting unit.

interactionClass.name: ActivityStatusReport
interactionClass.semantics: Base class for an activity report (absolute truth).

parameter.name: EntitiesInvolved
parameter.semantics: Reference to entities involved in a particular activity.

parameter.name: TimeLeftToCompletion
parameter.semantics: Amount of time (if known) to completion of activity. 0 if unknown.

parameter.name: Activity
parameter.semantics: A application specific description of the task since different CGF's / simulators are capable of executing different task types which may not fall neatly into those defined in the AggregateMissionEnum16.

parameter.name: ActivityType
parameter.semantics: Provide a universally understood summary of the activity using the aggregate mission enum (for compatability)

parameter.name: ElapsedTaskTime
parameter.semantics: Time entity has been performing task.

parameter.name: TaskExecutionStatus
parameter.semantics: Includes more specific information about the current task state (application specific) or sub-states within the task.

interactionClass.name: SpotReport
interactionClass.semantics: Spot reports are one-time reports used by all units to transmit intelligence or information about a spotted enemy, neutral, or unknown unit. The C2 agent shall base its low level BML tasks on this perceived truth data on non friendly / unknown units instead of RPR ground truth data. UnitType, EquipmentType, and Activity are strings since they are still experimental.

parameter.name: Observer
parameter.semantics: Unit that observed the enemy (or neutral/unknown unit) and sends the spot report.

parameter.name: IdentificationLevel
parameter.semantics: The identification level of the unit(s) spotted.

parameter.name: ForceIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Force Id of the spotted unit(s) as assumed by the observer.

parameter.name: Position
parameter.semantics: Position of the spotted unit at the specified time.

parameter.name: NumberOfUnits
parameter.semantics: Number of spotted units.

parameter.name: UnitType
parameter.semantics: Description of the units spotted. Subfields can be 0 if unknown, depending on the identification level.

parameter.name: NumberOfEquipments
parameter.semantics: Number of spotted enemy equipments.

parameter.name: EquipmentType
parameter.semantics: Description of the equipments spotted. Subfields can be 0 if unknown, depending on the identification level.

interactionClass.name: ActivitySpotReport
interactionClass.semantics: The information here is based on perception information which is determined from situation awareness, intel or potentially instinct.

parameter.name: EntitiesInvolved
parameter.semantics: Entities involved in the perceived activity.

parameter.name: Activity
parameter.semantics: Description of the activity of the enemy spotted.

parameter.name: ActivityType
parameter.semantics: Perceived activities are engaged in.

parameter.name: ElapsedTaskTime
parameter.semantics: Perceived time the task started if known. 0 if unknown.

parameter.name: TaskExecutionStatus
parameter.semantics: Perceived exeuction status.

enumeratedData.name: RulesOfEngagementEnum8
enumeratedData.semantics: Rules of engagment for a simulated unit.

enumeratedData.name: IdentificationLevelEnum8
enumeratedData.semantics: The identification level of an object.

enumeratedData.name: MoveTypeEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: CrossCountry: move directly to the destination without taking into account the roads. OnlyRoads: stay on the roads to get to the closest point to the destination that is still on a road; if there is no road very near to the start (within around 10 meters) there will be no movement at all. RoadsAndCrossCountry: move to the destination by taking into account the roads; it is allowed to go off the road.

enumeratedData.name: AttackTypeEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: The kind of attack by the enemy.

enumeratedData.name: AltitudeTypeEnum8
enumeratedData.semantics: AMSL = Above Mean Sea Level AGL = Abve Ground Level

enumeratedData.name: TaskTypeEnum8
enumeratedData.semantics: CancelAllOtherTasks: this new task replaces all other tasks. The current task has to be aborted as soon as possible and the new task can be executed at the start time. AddToTaskList: this new task will be executed after all other tasks with a smaller start time have been completed. InterruptCurrentTask: this new task interrupts the current task or is an adjustment of the current task.

arrayData.name: Datetime18
arrayData.semantics: A designation of a specified chronological point measured using Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) ISO 8601:2000 as a standard of reference, constrained to "zero meridian" i.e. �Zulu� time zone only. This is expressed as a composite field using a compacted ISO notation YYYYMMDDHHMMSS.SSS where YYYY represents a year, MM represents a month in values from 00 to 12, and DD represents a day in values from 00 to 31, HH represents an hour, MM represents a minute, and SS.SSS represents the number of seconds and milliseconds.

field.name: TaskCounter
field.semantics: This value shall be incremented by 1 for each sent task.

field.name: FederateHandle
field.semantics: The handle that the federate get when joining the federation.
